item.title: Making portal tele you somewhere
item.dc:creator: @Owner_A_Raffo Owner A Raffo
item.description:
@Owner_A_Raffo wrote:

search for

//portals

then theirs loads of portal things just press enter at end of one then copy this

case PORTALID: // memberportal if(playerIsMember == 1) //change the 1 to whatever rights you want it to be to use the portal teleportToX = XCOORD; //put the X coord where it says XCOORD teleportToY = YCOORD; //put the Y coord where it says YCOORD sendMessage("MESSAGE YOU WANT IT TO SEND TO PLAYER"); //put what message you want to send player break;

item.title: Making portal tele you somewhere
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

Well, make a video or something? You might have the wrong portal ID.

Code:

public void NewObjects

Search the above.

Code:

makeGlobalObject(absX, absY, portal id, 0, 10);

Don’t bother changing the last 2, you want the portal to look normal.

Or
Code:

addGlobalObject

Read full topic

item.title: Making portal tele you somewhere

item.description:
@x_dreamer_x wrote:

ok, i had my friend do this, so i dont know what he changed to make it work. but ima make new portal and it takes you to training. my friend made other one that take you to shops but i dont know what he changed.

heres what i have-

                      case 6551: //portal
	toX = 2315;
	toY = 4562;
	heightLevel = 0;
	sM("You teleport to beginning training 2!");
		break;

i know that works cuz other one does. i just dont know what i did wrong cuz when i click on portal nothing happens
